title: Crash during leaving search with selection
body:
I'm not sure what exactly triggered it, but that's the crash log

```
thread 'main' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 98 but the index is 18446744073709551517', /build/source/alacritty_terminal/src/term/mod.rs:520:26
stack backtrace:

                               at /build/source/alacritty_terminal/src/term/mod.rs:505:21

                               at /build/source/alacritty_terminal/src/term/mod.rs:490:23
```
